amendment.description: To require a report on the maturity and effectiveness of the Global Information Grid-Bandwidth Expansion (GIG-BE) network.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3166 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3166 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S6057-6058) To require a report on the maturity and effectiveness of the Global Information Grid-Bandwidth Expansion (GIG-BE) network.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3166 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3166 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
